menu.name: Bruschetta
menu.description: Grilled bread topped with fresh tomatoes, garlic, basil, and olive oil.

menu.name: Caesar Salad
menu.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

menu.description: Classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.

menu.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
menu.description: Traditional Italian pasta with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

menu.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
menu.description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey molten center.

menu.name: Tiramisu
menu.description: Layered dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone, and cocoa.

menu.name: Cappuccino
menu.description: Espresso with steamed milk and a layer of foam.
